actions.name: AUDIENCE+
actions.describe: An new audience entered the Live stream.

actions.name: AUDIENCE-
actions.describe: An audience left the Live stream.

actions.name: FREQUENT_AUDIENCE+
actions.describe: The number of audience rises during this time period.

actions.name: FREQUENT_AUDIENCE-
actions.describe: The number of audience drops during this time period.

actions.name: AUDIENCE_REGIST
actions.describe: An audience registed entering the Live stream, save his/her user name.
